data.message: Hey Facebook ! I have left numerous messages regarding the fact that I can not switch users therfore can nor properly run my verified page. This is a detrement to my business and my partners.... How can I gat SOMEONE to pay attention? This has been an issue for over 2 weeks! Dina Parise Racing<<<<<< Thank you

replies.message: I just went back and looked. The issuse has been persisting since April 1st. NO RESPONSE from FB But to say .... My report will help to make Facebook better? I realize you van not address each individual issue, but this NEEDS to be addressed. Yet NO ONE has bothered?
